aboutMe.title: About me
paragraphs: Hello, my name is Martin and I am an IT enthusiast and front-end developer "wanna be". I have completed several HTML, CSS, responsive design, GIT and JavaScript courses. I have taken most of the courses online as a self-taught so far (without a lecturer). However, I have just finished the JS Academy course from Skillmea (with a lecturer) and I still have the final exam to do.

I am focusing on writing this website and keep studying JavaScript atm. This website is my very first project, on which I would like to learn to apply all the experience and knowledge I have gathered in the courses mentioned above. I would like to do another project in some JS framework in the near future (Probably Vue or React).

projects.title: Porfolio
projects.description: This is my first ever FE project, you can find something about me here, a few of my other projects, or my contact. I am trying to use everything I've learned on this website, also trying to learn new things on it.

projects.title: Minigame
projects.description: I created this game while doing a JS Academy course. This is a super simple clicking game, where the score goes up for every target hit with your mouse.
